text: Cai-GÃ¶ran Alexander Stubb (born 1 April 1968) is a Finnish politician who is the 13th President of Finland since 2024. He was the 43rd Prime Minister of Finland from 24 June 2014 to 29 May 2015. He was the Leader of the National Coalition Party from 14 June 2014 to 11 June 2016. Stubb successfully ran for president in the 2024 election. After taking office, Stubb became the second Swedish-Finnish president in the history of Finland after Marshal of Finland, Baron C. G. E. Mannerheim. Stubb has been married to Suzanne Innes-Stubb, a British-Finnish lawyer, since 1998.https://yle.fi/a/74-20129742. title: Alexander Stubb
